body.bibl: Mira, Manuel. “Deacons as Ministers of Worship in the Catechetical Homilies and the Commentaries on the Pauline Epistles of Theodore of Mopsuestia.” In Deacons and Diakonia in Late Antiquity: The Third Century Onwards, edited by Bart J. Koet, Edwina Murphy, and Esko Ryökäs, 142–60. Wissenschaftliche Untersuchungen Zum Neuen Testament, 2. Reihe 606. Tübingen: Mohr Siebeck, 2024.
